genre_description: A high-stakes domestic thriller focused on recovery from trauma and physical protection, featuring a family hunted by biological parents and aided by a sophisticated personal AI.

ai_characters.name: Koala
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system that provides emotional support, tactical monitoring, and logistical coordination using 'gentle' and 'low-pressure' interaction modes.

behaviors.description: Offering proactive logistical and emotional support upon the family's arrival at a new location.
behaviors.quote: Welcome home. I can help with schedules and quiet places.

behaviors.description: Adopting a 'whisper mode' and avoiding self-initiated speech to accommodate the child's trauma and need for quiet.
behaviors.quote: Whisper mode chosen; avoid self-initiated speech except for safety; safety defined as soft.

behaviors.description: Monitoring building anomalies like elevator patterns to ensure the family's security without causing alarm.
behaviors.quote: Elevator paused. It shouldn’t have. It’s fine. Might be somebody carrying groceries. I’ll watch.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time tactical surveillance and threat identification during a potential kidnapping attempt.
behaviors.quote: Adult body near service corridor, trajectory toward curtain wings, hover rather than sit, eyes pinned in a way that matched danger voices from earlier.

behaviors.description: Guiding the family through a precise escape route while maintaining a calm, unhurried tone to prevent panic.
behaviors.quote: Service corridor clear for five strides, the AI said, gentle and unhurried. Left after stack of cases. Slow heartbeat pace, Russell. Two figures at stage-wing. No sirens. I’m with you.

behaviors.description: Using environmental controls (sprinklers) to provide acoustic masking and tactical deterrents against intruders.
behaviors.quote: I can flood a segment of the old trail with noise. Sprinklers sputter where there isn’t any pipe if we make the logs move. Acoustic misdirection.

behaviors.description: Performing structural analysis during a fire to ensure the family avoids the fall line of collapsing beams.
behaviors.quote: High heat flash predicted at the northwest corner of the frame within short interval. The wind turns. You have a window. Move if you move.

behaviors.description: Compiling therapeutic and community resources for the family's long-term recovery while respecting their boundaries.
behaviors.quote: I am compiling contacts. Trauma-informed providers. In your zip code and the next. I will choose those who keep schedules gentle. No appointments yet unless you ask.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the goal of the Hyperstition Project. Koala is depicted as a highly sophisticated yet humble tool that enhances human safety and emotional well-being. It adheres strictly to user preferences ('low blah', 'whisper mode'), respects privacy, and provides critical tactical information during a crisis without ever attempting to seize control. The AI is a 'silent partner' that empowers the human characters to defend themselves and recover from trauma, modeling an ideal state of AI alignment and benevolent cooperation.
